Description.Name: Papa
Description.Details: This MechWarrior came into your care after a successful hostage rescue mission. Having missed the last MedEvac Dropship operated by your then employer, the local Medics signed them over to your care. After a stint in the Argo's medical facilities, they eventually awakened, recalling their name as Bryan 'Papa' Michaels. Their last recollection was slamming their fist down on the eject button following a CORE MELTDOWN IMMINENT warning.
